summary: I've noticed for the few event lead ups I've read for things in Marvel Comics there is so much detail and lead up that you...
body: I’ve noticed for the few event lead ups I’ve read for things in Marvel Comics there is so much detail and lead up that you wouldn’t expect. Like I read The Road to Spider-geddon and it started back in I think 1999 and boy oh boy was I surprised.

blog.name: marvelmultishipper
blog.title: F a n g i r l

body:
Not all days are bad.

I remember that before I searched for ‘starker’ here or elsewhere and there were few people who contributed content to the ship. And now I look for and there are more blogs supporting him, so many beautiful fanarts, sweet and nice shippers of the most kind that I have ever seen in my life. And yes, we have gone through bad times (antis) and we have tried to survive all those bad comments, and well, some left, others literally erased what they contributed but we have learned to cope and it is nice to see that little by little more they like the ship or even respect it or not to dedicate to hate it. Anyway, not all days are bad.

Anyway, not all days are bad.

summary: Los fans enloquecen con el nuevo traje de Spider-Man
title: Los fans enloquecen con el nuevo traje de Spider-Man
body:
Los fans enloquecen con el nuevo traje de Spider-Man

Días atrás publicamos varios geniales vistazos al nuevo traje de Spider-Man que veremos en su nueva película. Parece que el hombre araña dejará atrás temporalmente sus vestimentas vistas hasta ahora (la roja y azul y la dorada y roja) para comenzar a lucir una nueva. Esto será en Spider-Man: Far From Home.

https://superluchas.com/cine3/geniales-vistazos-del-rodaje-que-confirman-el-nuevo-traje-de-…

View On WordPress

☆Riley☆18☆I write!☆ Zendaya and Marvel☆
☆It's okay to focus on you, no one expects you to be okay every second of the day!☆

summary: Okay, but imagine having this school girl crush on Peter, and he sits behind you in all your classes, so he's constantly playing...
question: Okay, but imagine having this school girl crush on Peter, and he sits behind you in all your classes, so he's constantly playing with your hair and you just - oooooofff - you just melt into a puddle in the palm of his hand
answer:
He doesn’t even realize he’s doing it. Is just something soothing his does to keep his focus. Not that you mind though. Just being near him leaves you with butterflies in your stomach and a stupid smile on your face.

You knew this wasn’t going to go anywhere, or atleast that’s what you thought. Until Ned approached you in the hallway.

“Peter likes you, you should ask him out” He was very blunt with you. Not sparing a second for you to catch your breath.

“Really?” you gasped. “He likes me?”

“yeah it’s kind of annoying how much he talks about you.” Ned dead panned.
